class.name: commander.tasks.knowledges.Defend
class.description: The knowledge of the 'Defend' mission. This knowledge is used by the commander agent to perform this mission.

method.name: getFinalMeetingPoint
method.description: Returns a random position around the 'meetingPoint' parameter (in a circle with a radius of 100 meters ). This position is reached by engineer units once they have finished their obstacles.

method.name: getDirection
method.description: Returns the main direction of the mission. This direction is used by scouting unit to monitor from the objectives.

method.name: getScoutObjectives
method.description: Returns the objectives for the scouting units.

method.name: getWithImprovement
method.description: Returns the value of the "withImprovement" parameter.

method.name: getWithReinforcement
method.description: In case of obstacles contruction, returns if the company need reinforcement. This implementation returns 'false'.
